subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius, a double-amputee sprinter who has divided and perplexed track officials and fans, made his debut Sunday in competition against world-class able-bodied runners.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius, a double-amputee sprinter who has divided and perplexed track officials and fans, made his debut Sunday in competition against world-class able-bodied runners.
